text: 2|220|Duniya o akheratera byapare. Ara lokera apanake iyatimadera samparke jijnesa kare; baluna, ‘tadera jan'ya subyabastha kara uttama’. Tomara yadi tadera sathe ekatre thaka tabe tara to tomadera'i bha'i. Allah‌ janena ke upakarakari ebam ke anistakari [1]. Ara allah‌ icche karale e bisaye tomaderake abasya'i kaste phelate paratena. Niscaya allah‌ prabala parakranta, prajnamaya.
